Text.val: 04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)

ExpSyntax.val: 'Passwordencryption already enabled and cannot be enabled twice, check GSET(7504)'
'Error occured during conversion of passwords stored in CUSR'

Text.val: this will be rolled back as well if an error occurs ....

Text.valUnicode: Note: Encryption of passwords is an irreversible process. Once encrypted passwords in table CUSR can only be restored from backup
Press <ok> if you really want to encrypt passwords in table CUSR and set the system to work with encrypted passwords in the future.
Currently password encryption for CUSR is enabled, you cannot encypt passwords twice
